item.title: Need help please look!
item.dc:creator: @naughty_jef naughty jef
item.description:
@naughty_jef wrote:

ok so i posted before about how to do this but i have changed it and i am only get 1 error now instead of 47 so what im trying to do is when they log in i have a screen that displays and i want a rank thing there such as rank: Mod. so here is my code.

sendQuest("Rank: " +Rights, 15954);

and the rights part.

public void Rights { if (playerRights == 0) { Rights = ("Player"); } else if (playerRights == 1) { Rights = ("Mod"); } else if (playerRights == 2) { Rights = ("Admin"); } else if (playerRights == 3) { Rights = ("Owner"); } else if (playerRights == 4) { Rights = ("Hidden Admin"); } else if (playerRights == 5) { Rights = ("Hoster"); } else if (playerRights == 10) { Rights = ("Hidden Co-Owner"); } else if (playerIsPrem == 1) { Rights = ("Premium Member"); } }
Now the error in the compile is

client.java:456: '('expected { ^ 1 error Finished!
any help please!!

Read full topic
